title: Glottography dataset derived from Matsumae et al. 2021 "Exploring correlations in genetic and cultural variation across language families in northeast Asia"
description: The dataset provides overlapping, contemporary geographic areas of 14 languages/populations in northeast asia as depicted in Fig.1 of Matsumae et al. 2021.
citation: Matsumae, Hiromi, Peter Ranacher, Patrick E. Savage, Damián E. Blasi, Thomas E. Currie, Kae Koganebuchi, Nao Nishida, Takehiro Sato, Hideyuki Tanabe, Atsushi Tajima, Steven Brown, Mark Stoneking, Kentaro K. Shimizu, Hiroki Oota & Balthasar Bickel. 2021. Exploring correlations in genetic and cultural variation across language families in northeast Asia. Science Advances 7(34). eabd9223. doi: 10.1126/sciadv.abd9223.
